attributes.action: stop parking on tyler street sheffield
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: people park in the dip on tyler street when park and ride is full, causing a hazard for other traffick

rejection.details:
We suggest in the first instance, you contact Sheffield City Council with regards to this petition.

Kind Regards

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
